56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ar-Rubayyi 'bint Mu'auwidh:We were in the company of the Prophet (ﷺ) providing the wounded with water and treating them and bringing the killed to Medina (from the battle field)

chapter.ara-name: باب مُدَاوَاةِ النِّسَاءِ الْجَرْحَى فِي الْغَزْوِ
chapter.eng-name: Treatment of the wounded by the women
